text: Nastaliq is a calligraphic version of the Perso-Arabic Alphabet. == Varieties of Nastaliq (alphabets) == ===Persian=== Letter Romanization IPA ā, a, (e), o, - , , , , b p t (s) j č (h) x d (z) r z c/ts s š (s) (z) (t) (z) (ā), (a), (e), (o), (-) , , , , ǧ f q k g l , (), () m n w, u , h y, i , ===Urdu=== Letter Romanization IPA ā, a, (e), o, - , , , , b p t ṭ (s) j č (h) x d ḍ (z) r ṛ z ž s š (s) (z) (t) (z) (ā), (a), (e), (o), (-) , , , , ǧ f q k g l , (), () m n nun ǧunna w, u , h _h , y, i , e/ay ===Punjabi (Shahmukhi)=== No. Name IPA Final glyph Medial glyph Initial glyph Isolated glyph 1 alif 2 bē 3 pē 4 tē 5 ṭē 6 s̱ē 7 jīma 8 cē 9 waḍḍi ḥē 10 k͟hē 11 dāla 12 ḍāla 13 ẕāla 14 rē 15 ṛē 16 zē 17 zhē 18 sīna 19 shīna 20 ṣwāda 21 ẓwāda 22 t̤oē 23 z̤oē 24 aina 25 g͟haina 26 fē 27 qāfa 28 kāfa 29 gāfa 30 lāma 31Rarely used in literature, except when a distinction between the pronunciation of the non-retroflex character is needed ḷāma 32 mīma 33 nūna 34 ṇūṇa 35 nūn ġunnah 36 wāoa 37 choṭī hē gol hē 38 do-cashmī hē or 39 hamzah , 40 choṭī yē 41 waḍḍi yē ===Pashto=== Letter Romanization IPA ā, a, (e), o, - , , , , b p t ṭ (s) j č (h) x ṡ ż d ḍ (z) r ṛ z ž s š (s) (z) (t) (z) (ā), (a), (e), (o), (-) , , , , ǧ f q k g l , (), () m n ṇ ṉ w, u , h ə y, i , e ay ạy y ===Kashmiri=== Letter Romanization IPA ā, a, (e), o, - , , , , b p t ṭ (s) j č (h) x d ḍ (z) r ṛ z ž s š (s) (z) (t) (z) (ā), (a), (e), (o), (-) , , , , ǧ f q/k , k g l , (), () m n ṇ w, u , v o h _h , y , 'y , e ==References== == Other websites == * Rumicode: Online Service For Calligraphy * Nastaliq Online: Online Service For Calligraphy * Nastaliq Writer for Macintosh by SIL * Faiz Nastaliq: Official Faiz site * Nastaliq Script | Persian Calligraphy * Awami Nastaliq: A Nastaliq font by SIL International Category:Alphabets
